word: 19, 22 (1 Thessalonians 3:13; 4:7; Hebrews 12:14). Wholeness to God--Holiness is wholeness to God. The soul is surrendered to God. The will, and even the thoughts, are brought into subjection to the will of Christ. The love of Jesus fills the soul, and is constantly going out in a clear, refreshing stream, to make glad the hearts of others (MS 33, 1911).
